entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
